alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Carroll; Chariton; Daviess; Grundy; Linn; Livingston; Sullivan (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 9:20AM CDT until June 29 at 10:15AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Chariton County in north central Missouri... Linn County in north central Missouri... Daviess County in north central Missouri... Southern Grundy County in north central Missouri... Southern Sullivan County in north central Missouri... Northwestern Carroll County in north central Missouri... Caldwell County in north central Missouri... Livingston County in north central Missouri... * Until 1015 AM CDT. * At 919 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Gilman City to near Breckenridge to near Cowgill, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Chillicothe, Trenton, Brookfield, Marceline, Hamilton, Gallatin, Braymer, Polo, Jamesport, Bucklin, Meadville, Hale, Breckenridge, Gilman City, Kingston, Pattonsburg, Laclede, Linneus, Wheeling and Utica. This includes Interstate 35 in Missouri between mile markers 64 and 82. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.

area.areaDesc: Caldwell; Carroll; Chariton; Daviess; Grundy; Linn; Livingston; Sullivan
